entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4 except minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
